name: F16 Nitro Aeroflight - Air Fighters Pilot Landing
name_original: F16 Nitro Aeroflight - Air Fighters Pilot Landing
description:
Fly your F16 Super Jet, racing in an endless arcade flight runner. Testing out your piloting skills, see how far can you go, as you race your super jet at low altitudes, passing through checkpoint rings and avoiding obstacles.


In one of a kind flying adventure, your job as the super jet pilot is to survive for as long as possible, as you pass through the waypoint rings and avoid buildings and moving walls. The obstacles will be highly tricky, with multiple patterns and speeds. Pass through the rings to gain speed to keep up with the tracks and keep tilting to dodge the moving walls.


FEATURES

- One of a kind endless aerial runner
- Score as high as you can by surviving the longest
- Pass the checkpoint rings to boost the super jet speed
- Tilt device to strafe and avoid building and moving walls
- Highly addictive gameplay
